citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
**No alternative search had been conducted and documented in this protocol. Procedures involving more than
momentary pain and distress should include the consideration of alternatives to those procedures by the principal
investigator. In order to adequately review the activities involving animals, the IACUC should ensure the principal
investigator has considered alternatives to procedures that may involve more than momentary pain and/or distress.
Correct by: from this date forward

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
**It was noted during the review of records the following: semi-annual reviews of the humane care and use program and
animal facilities had not been conducted by the IACUC. As a result of semi annual reviews not being conducted by the
IACUC, results of these evaluations had not been provided to the Institutional Official. The appointed IACUC is
responsible for conducting semi annual reviews of the facilities in addition to the humane care and use program of the
research facility. In order to adequately review the activities involving animals and assess the facility's facilities,
procedures and program, the IACUC must conduct semi annual reviews of the facilities, program and provide results of
the evaluations to the Institutional Official.
Correct by: from this date forward
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
**No alternative search had been conducted and documented in this protocol.  Procedures involving more than 
momentary pain and distress should include the consideration of alternatives to those procedures by the principal 
investigator.  In order to adequately review the activities involving animals, the IACUC should ensure the principal 
investigator has considered alternatives to procedures that may involve more than momentary pain and/or distress. 
Correct by:  from this date forward 
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
**It was noted during the review of records the following:  semi-annual reviews of the humane care and use program and 
animal facilities had not been conducted by the IACUC.   As a result of semi annual reviews not being conducted by the 
IACUC, results of these evaluations had not been provided to the Institutional Official.   The appointed IACUC is 
responsible for conducting semi annual reviews of the facilities in addition to the humane care and use program of the 
research facility.  In order to adequately review the activities involving animals and assess the facility's facilities, 
procedures and program, the IACUC must conduct semi annual reviews of the facilities, program and provide results of

the evaluations to the Institutional Official. 
Correct by: from this date forward 
 
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
End Section
